name: Beginner
description: Ideal for individuals who are new to exercising or returning after a long break. Focuses on learning form, building consistency, and improving general fitness.

name: Intermediate
description: Designed for users with some experience in training. Emphasizes progression in strength, endurance, and complexity of movements.

name: Advance
description: Tailored for experienced individuals seeking to optimize performance. Includes high-intensity, technical, or sport-specific training routines.
